growing_notes: Perennial canes. Mature height: 4-6 feet. Root depth: medium. Spreads by suckers.
Perennial. Mature height: 5-7 feet. Tip-roots. Prune old canes after fruiting.
Perennial. Mature height: 4-6 feet. Everbearing type.
Perennial. Mature height: 5-8 feet. Semi-erect canes. Trellis recommended.
Perennial. Vigorous trailing canes to 20 feet. Trellis required.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 4-6 feet, spread: 3-4 feet. Needs acidic soil (pH 4.5-5.5). Root depth: shallow.
Perennial. Mature height: 1-2 feet. Very cold hardy. Acidic soil needed.

description: Tart berries for pies and jams
growing_notes: Perennial shrub. Mature height: 3-5 feet. Very cold hardy. Some varieties thorny.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 3-5 feet. Very cold hardy. Self-fertile.

description: Dark berries high in vitamin C
growing_notes: Perennial shrub. Mature height: 3-4 feet. Compact variety. Very nutritious.

description: Dark purple berries for syrup and wine
growing_notes: Perennial shrub. Mature height: 8-12 feet, spread: 6-8 feet. Root depth: medium. Needs pollinator.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 3-6 feet. Extremely cold hardy. Beautiful fall color.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 4-6 feet. Extremely cold hardy (-40°F). Needs pollinator.
Perennial shrub/small tree. Mature height: 10-15 feet. Very cold hardy. Wildlife friendly.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 6-10 feet. Drought tolerant once established.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 4-6 feet. Very cold hardy. Hips edible, high in vitamin C.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 8-10 feet, spread: 6-8 feet. Fast growing. Very cold hardy.
Perennial shrub/small tree. Mature height: 12-15 feet, spread: 8-10 feet. Very cold hardy.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 6-8 feet, spread: 5-7 feet. Cold hardy. Blooms on new wood.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 5-8 feet. Drought tolerant. May be invasive in some areas.
Perennial evergreen shrub. Mature height: 6-8 feet. Needs acidic soil. Shallow roots.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 6-8 feet. Very cold hardy. Needs acidic soil.
Perennial evergreen shrub. Mature height: 2-3 feet. Slow growing. Good for formal hedges.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 4-6 feet, spread: 5-8 feet. Very cold hardy. Low maintenance.
Perennial shrub. Mature height: 4-5 feet, spread: 4-5 feet. Cold hardy. Attracts hummingbirds.
Perennial evergreen. Mature height: 4-6 inches, spread: 6-8 feet. Very drought tolerant.

Perennial evergreen. Mature height: 3-4 feet, spread: 3-4 feet. Very cold hardy.
